name: Journal Retention and Needs Listing
short_description: The administration of the George A. Smathers Libraries at UF identified the need for a software tool to assist the new Florida Academic Repository (FLARE) program manage and track journal holdings and gaps.  It was decided that the software should be flexible enough to be used by other journal archiving programs. The software is branded as UF, and is licensed as FOSS using the GNU GPL.
summary: Allow library archiving programs to manage journal holdings and gaps
